description: A simple wrapper around the OAuth2 credentials library.

params.description: (Optional) The MD5 hash of the object referenced by resource.
params.name: content_md5

params.description: (Optional) A value that indicates which generation of the resource to fetch.
params.name: generation

params.description: (Optional) Content disposition of responses to requests for the signed URL.
params.name: response_disposition

params.description: (Optional) The content type of the object referenced by resource.
params.name: content_type

params.description: Credentials object with an associated private key to sign text.
params.name: credentials

params.description: A pointer to a specific resource (typically, /bucket-name/path/to/blob.txt).
params.name: resource

params.description: When the signed URL should expire.
params.name: expiration

params.description: The HTTP verb that will be used when requesting the URL. Defaults to 'GET'.
params.name: method

params.description: (Optional) Content type of responses to requests for the signed URL. Used to over-ride the content type of the underlying resource.
params.name: response_type

params.description: Optional URI base. Defaults to empty string.
params.name: api_access_endpoint

name: Credentials
